name: Skull Coaster
description: A high-speed rollercoaster diving through the island’s cursed skull caverns.

name: Volcano Surge
description: A fiery ride that bursts through the heart of Mystery Island’s dormant volcano.

name: Tiki Boat Drift
description: Relax and cruise through glowing lagoons and hidden temples.

name: Jungle Maze
description: Get lost in a twisting green labyrinth filled with riddles and secrets.

name: Mystery Resort
description: A serene escape for guests seeking relaxation, spa treatments, and fine island dining.
